title: Rabbid Mario

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Boomshot: Attack the player directly above or below you on the player list (skipping past dead people) with a Powerful Attack, as well as the next player in the same direction with an Astral Basic Attack.
- Hammer: Deal a Powerful Attack to everyone who visits you tonight, including fellow Koopa members.
- Bodyguard: Grant yourself Powerful Defense tonight that only works against non-astral attacks.
- Magnet Dance: Redirect every non-Koopa who visits any other Koopa to yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each night, you may use either Boomshot or Hammer in addition to either Bodyguard or Magnet Dance.
- Other than Boomshot, none of your abilities may be used two nights in a row.
- Players you kill cannot have their cause of death hidden or disguised.

desc:
Post 2125
*A big league brawler with exceptional luck, a dependable defense, solid moves, and massive case of imposter syndrome. Wind him up, set him loose, and get out of his way!*
